thread.title: Head of German Police Union Describes the Refugee Chaos | Opinion - Conservative
thread.title_full: Head of German Police Union Describes the Refugee Chaos | Opinion - Conservative

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Head of German Police Union Describes the Refugee Chaos | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Hat tip Gates of Vienna
In the below interview on German TV, Rainer Wendt, the head of the German police union, describes the chaos surrounding the refugee problem in Germany (English sub-titles).
http://gatesofvienna.net/2015/10/they-instinctively-know-that-our-laws-are-weak/
Once again, in viewing the images, you should note the sheer preponderance of young males among the refugees. Wendt describes the violence and the criminality they are experiencing. I wonder how many of these “refugees” are, in fact, ISIS plants waiting to murder innocent civilians.
